be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.util

Class ConsumerMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.util.economy.ConsumerMath

  • public final class ConsumerMath
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for regularly used consumer math methods. Note: We use BigDecimal to represent a currency as suggested by the official data types documentation.

    • Method Summary
